snippet: When New Orleans won the N.B.A. draft lottery on Wednesday night, the result seemed too good to be true and sappy enough to be scripted, a longtime lottery tradition.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column on NBA draft lottery asserts that New Orleans Hornets win seems too good to be true and sappy enough to be scripted.
lead_paragraph: When New Orleans won the N.B.A. draft lottery on Wednesday night, the result seemed too good to be true and sappy enough to be scripted, a longtime lottery tradition.
